sentences.en: Compared with traditional methods, it has the merits of high absorptivity handiness and no environment pollution.
sentences.cn: 相对于传统方法, 它具有吸收率高、使用方便、不污染环境等优点.

sentences.en: He can do any sort of work requiring handiness and dexterity.
sentences.cn: 他能够胜任任何需要心灵手巧的工作.

sentences.en: I was greatly impressed by the handiness with which she played the piano.
sentences.cn: 她弹奏钢琴如此娴熟,给我留下了深刻印象.

sentences.en: It is excellent for its handiness, elegance and beauty.
sentences.cn: 它最大的优点是轻巧 、 优雅和美观.

sentences.en: Precise design of complete machine, compact conformation, handiness and simplicity.
sentences.cn: 整机设计精致, 结构紧凑, 操作方便简洁.

sentences.en: Provide full auto and unload apparatus , handiness and immediacy.
sentences.cn: 配备全自动上下料装置, 操作方便快捷.

sentences.en: Self - provided large paper roll hoisting equipment and handiness & immediacy.
sentences.cn: 自备大纸卷起重设备, 操作方便 快捷.

words.tran_cn: 便利的；手边的，就近的；容易取得的；敏捷的
